page.title: 16** LIST OF FAVOURITE TOYS **
page.content:
{LIST TO SHOW THE FAVOURITE TOYS OF {PUPILS AGED 7 - 9 YEARS AT ST. {GREGORYS PRIMARY SCHOOL IN 1985.
BARBIE OR CINDY DOLLS - 11 PUPILS CARE BEARS - 7 PUPILS BMX BIKE - 5 PUPILS SPEAK AND SPELL - 4 PUPILS MY LITTLE PONY - 3 PUPILS ACTION FORCE - 3 PUPILS STAR WARS - 3 PUPILS SCALECTRIC - 3 PUPILS CABBAGE PATCH DOLL - 2 PUPILS CARS - 2 PUPILS ROLLER BOOTS - 2 PUPILS
{ONE PUPIL VOTED FOR EACH OF THE {FOLLOWING TOYS: TOMMY TROPIC * SPACE INVADERS * GUNS * MONOPOLY * STAY ALIVE * TRAIN SET * RAINBOW BRITE * KNIGHT RIDER * DOLL * TRANSFORMERS * BIG FOOT * ORGAN *
